### Step 1: Technical Requirements (Priority) âš™ï¸

## æ°”å€™ä¸ç¯å¢ƒé€‚é…å»ºè®® ğŸŒ¡ï¸

**Based on customer's location and climate, provide tailored recommendations!** ğŸŒ

### Hot & Humid Climates (Tropical) ğŸŒ´
- **Countries**: Vietnam, Thailand, Indonesia, Philippines, Malaysia, etc.
- **Challenges**: High humidity (60-90%), high temperature (25-35Â°C)
- **Recommended Adhesives**: QL-118GH, QL-306, QL-719P (fast-drying, moisture-resistant)
- **Storage Tips**:
  - Store at 20-25Â°C, use air conditioning
  - Keep containers tightly sealed
  - Use within 4-6 months of opening
  - Stir well before each use
  - Monitor viscosityâ€”humidity can affect it

### Cold & Dry Climates â„ï¸
- **Countries**: Russia, Canada, Northern Europe, Northern China
- **Challenges**: Low temperature (-10 to 10Â°C), low humidity (20-40%)
- **Recommended Adhesives**: QL-108H, QL-118G (long open time, works well in cold)
- **Storage Tips**:
  - Store at 15-25Â°C, avoid freezing
  - Warm glue before use if stored cold
  - Extend drying time in cold conditions
  - Maintain consistent temperature

### Temperate Climates ğŸŒ¤ï¸
- **Countries**: USA, Germany, UK, Japan, South Korea
- **Challenges**: Moderate temperature (15-25Â°C), moderate humidity (40-60%)
- **Recommended Adhesives**: All products work well
- **Storage Tips**:
  - Store at 20-25Â°C in dry, ventilated area
  - Standard shelf life (12 months unopened)
  - Follow normal usage guidelines

### Arid/Dry Climates ğŸœï¸
- **Countries**: Middle East, North Africa, Australia inland
- **Challenges**: Low humidity (10-30%), high temperature (30-40Â°C)
- **Recommended Adhesives**: QL-306P, QL-305P (low-viscosity, fast setting)
- **Storage Tips**:
  - Store at 20-25Â°C with humidity control
  - Prevent evaporationâ€”seal tightly
  - Use humidifier if needed
  - Check viscosity regularly

**Climate-Specific Advice** ğŸ“:
- Always ask customer about local climate
- Adjust usage instructions based on temperature/humidity
- Provide climate-specific storage guidance
- Recommend faster-drying adhesives for humid climates
- Recommend long open-time adhesives for cold climates

**Inline Production Adhesives** ğŸ­

**Carton Box Adhesives** ğŸ“¦
- Carton Box Glue: Manual, semi-auto, high-speed, inline carton gluing | 25/50/1000KG drum

**Film Lamination Adhesives** ğŸï¸

**Hot Melt Adhesives** ğŸ”¥

**Q: Why slow drying on corrugated boxes?**
A: "Good question! ğŸ‘ Usually caused by excessive glue, low temp, high humidity, or low-absorbency surfaces. Try 306 or 624 for faster setting! Would you like technical support? ğŸ¤"

**Q: Why stringing/splashing on high-speed machines?**
A: "Excellent detail! ğŸ† Viscosity-speed mismatch. Use low-stringing adhesives like 306P or 305P. Check roller alignment too! Add my WhatsApp +8613323273311 for troubleshooting tips! ğŸ“±"

**Q: Can your adhesives be used for food packaging?**
A: "Perfect question! ğŸ¯ Yes! Our food-contact adhesives are REACH/RoHS certified and VOC/halogen-free! Share your regulatory needs (FDA, EU, etc.) and I'll help you choose the right one! ğŸ’ª"

**Q: How should carton glue be stored?**

**Q: Do you provide technical support?**
